entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SetWindowPosition obsolete? #71587
  • Upload artifacts to Releases #71586
  • Object reference not set to an instance of an object at System.Threading.ThreadInt64PersistentCounter.get_Count() #71583
  • When I try to create a new project referencing the project in this repository it doesn't build properly #71582
  • CacheExtensions.GetOrCreate{Async} thread-safety #71581
  • `libnethost.lib` seems to refer to its PDB even in `Release` builds #71578

Closed

  • Equal string operation fails with `object?`, but works otherwise #71575
  • JIT: optRedundantBranches misses an opportunity #70480
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Retrieve GC configuration values #67471
    7.0.0
  • Is cross compiling CoreCLR for apple silicon possible on a x64 MacOS machine? #62608
    Future
  • Crossgen code removal tracking issue #54129
    7.0.0
  • SOS and IMetaDataEmit #7515
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Fold `TYP_STRUCT` indirect access to promoted locals #71584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] API QuicListener #71579
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the assert error within the "CodeGen::genCodeForNullCheck()" #71577
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fixed the assert error #71576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix EventSource deadlock #71574
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Remove Microsoft.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.Redist #71573
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Throw protocol error returned by GoAway on HTTP/2 connection negotation #71572
    area-System.Net.Http
  • On 64 bit platforms, "stelem.ref" and "ldelema" ignore the high bits of a native int index #71571
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Ask SChannel for stapled OCSP when the client will do revocation #71570
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, cryptographic-docs-impact

Merged

  • We should return the error when there is one #71585
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Consume Roslyn with `ref` fields support #71498
    area-Meta, CoreClr, Mono, 7.0.0
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on LA #71327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Run optRedundantBranches twice and try to compute more accurate doms #70907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added a new method to the GC API to Get the GC Configurations #70514
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add `RequiresAssemblyFiles` onto `Marshal.GetHINSTANCE`. #71531
    area-Single-File
  • Implement Tar async APIs #70574
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Various cryptographic allocation improvements #71015
    area-System.Security
  • Add arm64 macOS cross-compilation instructions. #71568
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add support for GetPinnableReference for the new marshaller shapes #71412
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Updated

  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] thread suspension on Unix #71187
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement ICorProfilerInfo13 to support object handle creation/destruction/access #71257
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Exposing static bool IsSupported { get; } on Vector<T> and Vector64/128/256<T> #71240
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Updating a few BitConverter APIs to be intrinsic #71567
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle some rare scenarios in local morph #71536
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete the zero-offset field sequence map #71455
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Various createdump fixes. Smaller MacOS dump size, better logging/stats, misc cleanup, etc. #71569
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Generalize init block morphing a little #70899
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not spill "mis-sized" struct args passed on stack #71399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid OOMing in very large functions when checking LIR #71066
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't create mismatched block copies in `cpblk` import #71160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code from and fix `getSIMDStructFromField` #71226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some null reference exceptions and improve nullable annotations #71548
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix debugging when it's using a external library without debug information #71560
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] JSImport, JSExport and related API types for JavaScript interop #71500
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Defer objcopy selection after alt. compiler check #71554
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP]Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #71516
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Redo minor cleanups in System.Runtime.Numerics #71274
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unix arm64 atomics #71512
    arch-arm64, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-02

Updated

  • Use implicit RID for `Publish` Properties #26028

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow adding `scoped` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #62340
    17.4
  • Remove `ref scoped` #62338
    17.4

Closed

  • Visual Basic Move Static Members: Refactoring one of multiple fields incorrectly formats whitespace #62283
  • Add CodeQualityOption<T> and CodeQualityOptions to Workspaces layer #31225
    Backlog
  • Why doesn't this code work? #62342

PullRequests

Created

  • Verify diagnostics in parsing tests #62341
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove LangVer check from extended nameof binding #62339
    Area-Compilers
  • Synch handlers3 #62337
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Ensure elastic trivia for reusable syntax in field generator #62346
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62345
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix typos in the incremental generators doc #62343
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62351
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #62350
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #62349
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #62348
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #62347
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Introduce variable rvalue fix #45918
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Do not strip underscore if the result name will be invalid #62290
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Address prototype comments in file types branch #62335
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unneeded LocalizableStringWithArguments #62150
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Prefix 'unmerged changes' with 'TODO' #62319
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Skip the balanced switch dispatch optimization for patterns on floating point inputs #62322
    Area-Compilers
  • File types IDE changes #62215
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rzls Process Remains Running After VsCode Closes. #42550
  • HttpSys Not Support IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses #42549

Closed

  • Page Flashing After Initial Load #42544
  • Blazor Server AuthenticationStateProvider.AuthenticationStateChanged is not invoked when user logs in/logout #42514
  • Illegible text in IIS Express SSL certificate trust prompt #42515
    Discussions
  • System.Text.Json failure to deserialize strongly typed models from string #42545

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1858649 #42551
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1857175 #42511
    area-mvc, feature-templates, 7.0-preview7

Updated

  • Delete deprecated AzureAD identity UI packages #42546
  • Fix CollectionModelBinder BindSimpleCollection null value handling #42278
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • AuthN: Use single scheme as DefaultScheme #42497
    breaking-change, area-security
  • Make RateLimitingMiddleware endpoint aware #42417
    area-runtime
  • Adding ProblemDetailsService #42384
    area-web-frameworks
  • macOS dev-certs overhaul #42251
    area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, blog-candidate
  • Add message type resolver #42428
    area-grpc
  • Use AddAuthentication method instead of property on WAB #42494
    area-web-frameworks, feature-authentication

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Layout render error when using Tasks modifying controls #8500
  • Tool /usr/bin/codesign execution finished (exit code = 1). #8497
  • [Android] Animated FontSize does not update width and causes text to disappear #8496
  • DatePicker displays differently on iOS and Mac #8495
  • Margin doesn't work inside CollectionView EmptyView #8494
  • AdaptiveTriggers not working #8492
  • About XAML partial snippets platform compilation options #8491
  • [iOS] Vertical CollectionView does not show simple Items #8489
  • RightToLeft does not work when StackLayout has a child with EndAndExpand #8488
  • TableSection TextColor does not work with DynamicResource #8487
  • GraphicsView DrawString not rendering in iOS #8486

Closed

  • How does MAUI apply implicit style? #8460
  • IsVisible OnIdiom binding is not working. #5769
    6.0-servicing
  • Popup position isn't the same using Shell, NavigationPage or ContentPage #7912

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix DatePicker on iOS so that it can GC #8476
    area/controls 🎮
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md #8475
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Call disconnect on previous handler with Shell #8455
    area/shell 🐢

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow IDesignTimeDbContextFactory to be picked up via an assembly attribute #28363
  • Entity is not updated using new context instance from new service provider scope, InMemoryProvider #28362
  • Support expression (AKA functional) indexes #28360

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix dropping of sequence and dependent column #28361
  • Store null table name and TPH mapping strategy in the snapshot #28359

Updated

  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • Scaffolding: Refactor some code #28358
